sentences.en: As a captain, he was greatly respected, and his'brave sailing efforts helped revolutionize the world.
sentences.cn: 作为一位船长, 他非常受尊重, 而且他的勇敢航行努力有助于宣传世界.

sentences.en: His work revolutionized the treatment of this disease.
sentences.cn: 他的研究成果给这种疾病的治疗带来了革命。

sentences.en: If this could be done computationally, it would significantly reduce the cost and revolutionize structural biology.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质及聚合物的结构设计也有相当大的理论和现实意义.

sentences.en: New fuel - cell components will revolutionize the auto industry.
sentences.cn: 新的燃料电池零组件将为汽车业带来大变革.

sentences.en: New technology is going to revolutionize everything we do.
sentences.cn: 新科技将彻底改变我们做的每一件事。

sentences.en: There is no question that the laser will continue to revolutionize the field of chemistry.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,激光将继续使化学领域发生变革.

words.tran_cn: 革命的；旋转的；大变革的
彻底改变（等于revolutionize）；使革命化

trans.tran_en: to completely change the way people do something or think about something

trans.tran_cn: 发动革命，彻底改革，使革命化
